name: Operator (itch)
description:
Inspired by an old telephone line operator, players try to connect data or telephone lines based on the voices heard from the tasks appear in the side of the screen. There are also conference calls and broadcast/stream data connections that require more than one connection.

How To Play
- Connect the shapes according to tasks on the left side of the screen
- Use your mouse to listen the audio cues of the tasks
- Use red lines to end the connections after the conversation
- Use the right connection type, or you'll just get crickets !

Controls
- LMB: Creates connection between shapes
- RMB:  Creates red lines
- Space: Changes the connection type
